# datafy_autoscaling_rule (Data Source)

Retrieves a specific Datafy Autoscaling Rule.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datafy_autoscaling_rule" "example" {
  account_id = "79c406c5-7b64-43f2-ba76-9b01e74e3d90"
  rule_id    = "rule-01KB3R5TBDA729KK95KJ72JWS5"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account_id` (String) The unique identifier of the Datafy account.
- `rule_id` (String) The unique identifier of the Datafy Autoscaling Rule.
